modName: Two Cute Girls Companions by Broliii
summary: Adds Two cute breton girls into game world - Assassin and Spell sword.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/35cpmxh.jpg[/img][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ezh9vo.jpg[/img]

At first I would like to say hello to all Users of nexus site.
This is My first mod that I\'ve ever created and shared so I gladly present my:

[color=yellow][b]******************************* Two Cute Companions *******************************[/b][/color]

Both girls are Breton sister females located at Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn.
The first blond one Ashlin is an experienced assassin. Don\'t get confused by her cute look. She is killing enemies with ease using her stealth abilities.
The second one is Celina and She is slaying your enemies using both magic and sword. She has healing abilities which will be helpful in combat.

[color=pink]ORIGINAL[/color]
Chose this package if you like more slutty/stronger make up look of girls.

[color=pink]LITE[/color]
This version changes lips and eyes make up so its not so intensive. Pack for players that doesn\'t like strong slutty make ups.

[color=yellow][b]******************************* Installation ***********************************************[/b][/color]
Just unpack all files from .rar into your Data folder. 
You may use only one companion at the same time. I have made them in different files.

[color=yellow][b]******************************* Requirements *******************************************[/b][/color]
Your game need latest update by Bethesda.
If you want an exact look on both girls you have to download those mods:

ApachiiSkyHair by apachii: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
Cover eyes by mrLenski http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
RANs HeadMesh Variants Type A by RAN46 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7127
Pretty Lips by Danariel http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167
Calientes Curvy Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Calientes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Race Compatibility by expired6978 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10165

Optional:
Girls are originally bretons but if u don\'t care about lore friendly aspects you may want to use those:
numenume elf ear by itamukun http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13173
Push-up sexy bikinis CBBE v3 by Nikitaa http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11764

If you want more than one follower and want to have more conversation options use those mods:
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037 
Followers can Relax by King Coin http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504

[color=yellow][b]******************************* Credits *******************************[/b][/color]
Thanks for apachii for his hairs
Thanks for mrLenski for his Cover eyes
Thanks for BellaGail for his Better Females
Thanks for RAN46 for his HeadMesh Variants Type A
Thanks for Danariel for his Pretty Lips
Thanks for Calientes for his Curvy Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
Thanks for Nikitaa for his Push-up sexy bikinis CBBE v3
Thanks for expired6978 for his Creating a Playable Race - The right way
Thanks for martinnehuen for his ctd crash solution


[color=yellow][b]******************************* Permission *******************************[/b][/color]

You can use my characters in other mods but you have to pm me and give me credit.


[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ikwsx2.jpg[/img]



Sorry for my English. I know its not perfect.

Pozdrowienia dla polak√≥w :)
